description:
<p>This is a fantastic opportunity for a highly motivated, enthusiastic Practice Nurse or Health Care Assistant to join our small, friendly, dynamic and skilled team. We are looking for a part time Nurse to expand our team of 2 Practice Nurses and 1 HCA. Working between 10-20 hrs a week. Experience preferred but willingness to learn and flexibility of working are more important.</p>
<p>Informal visits/enquires to Nicky Jones, ANP/Lead Nurse Nicola.jones40@nhs.net</p>
title: Nurse or HCA
